SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.logic

Class BasicTwoPlayerRules

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.logic.BasicTwoPlayerRules
All Implemented Interfaces:
RuleSet
public class BasicTwoPlayerRules extends Object implements RuleSet
Implements a simple two-player pool rule set.

Tracks scores, turns, fouls, and determines when to switch players. Handles turn updates once all motion has stopped.

    • onBallPotted

      public void onBallPotted(int ballId, int pocketIndex)
      Handles a potted ball. In this simple rule set, every object ball is worth one point.
      Specified by:
      onBallPotted in interface RuleSet
      Parameters:
      ballId - ID of the ball that was potted (0 = cue ball)
      pocketIndex - index of the pocket the ball entered

      Specified by:
      onScratch in interface RuleSet
      Parameters:
      pocketIndex - index of the pocket where the cue ball fell

      Updates turn and foul logic once all balls have stopped moving. Switches players when appropriate and notifies listeners.
